name: benjamin
dataSource: Super enriched combining V6, V7, V8, V10, V11
culturalSignificance: The name Benjamin has deep roots in biblical history, being the name of the youngest son of Jacob and Rachel in the Old Testament. It symbolizes favor and strength, often associated with leadership and wisdom in Jewish and Christian traditions.
modernContext: Benjamin remains a popular name in many English-speaking countries, consistently ranking in the top 100 names for boys. It is favored for its classic appeal and strong historical roots.
literaryReferences: Benjamin is a key character in George Orwell's 'Animal Farm', representing the skeptical, wise old donkey.
personality: People named Benjamin are often perceived as intelligent, reliable, and charismatic. They are seen as natural leaders with a strong sense of justice and fairness.
symbolism: The name Benjamin symbolizes strength, favor, and the right hand of power, often associated with leadership and wisdom.
funFact: Benjamin Franklin, one of the Founding Fathers of the United States, was a polymath who made significant contributions to science, politics, and literature.

religiousSignificance.significance: Benjamin was the youngest son of Jacob and Rachel, and his descendants formed one of the twelve tribes of Israel.
keyStories: The story of Benjamin in the Book of Genesis, where he is favored by his father Jacob.
religiousSignificance.spiritualMeaning: Benjamin represents the beloved and favored child, symbolizing strength and protection.
religiousSignificance.historicalImpact: The Tribe of Benjamin played a significant role in the history of Israel, with notable figures like King Saul emerging from it.

achievements: Founding Father of the United States
historicFigures.significance: Franklin was instrumental in the American Enlightenment and the history of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding electricity.

achievements: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
Key figure in the creation of the modern Conservative Party
historicFigures.significance: Disraeli played a central role in the creation of the modern Conservative Party and was known for his influential voice in world affairs.

moviesAndShows.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
moviesAndShows.characterDescription: A man who ages in reverse, experiencing life in a unique way.

characterQuotes.quote: I was thinking how nothing lasts, and what a shame that is.
characterQuotes.source: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
characterQuotes.context: Benjamin reflects on the transient nature of life as he experiences it in reverse.
characterQuotes.impact: This quote captures the essence of the film's exploration of time and mortality.

songs.title: Benjamin
songs.description: This upbeat track by San Cisco captures a playful and youthful energy, focusing on themes of friendship and carefree adventures. The song creates a lighthearted atmosphere with its catchy melody and vibrant instrumentation.

songs.title: Benjamin Twine
songs.description: George Ezra delivers a warm and heartfelt song that celebrates the bond between friends. The track is characterized by its soothing acoustic guitar and Ezra's rich vocals, conveying a sense of nostalgia and appreciation.

songs.title: Benjamin
songs.description: The Paper Kites offer a gentle and reflective song that explores themes of hope and new beginnings. The serene melody and soft harmonies create an uplifting and comforting listening experience.
